summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.0°C) and outside temperature (up 2.3°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3066 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), dew point temperature (up 3.0°C), outside temperature (up 2.3°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air moisture should feel ok and light winds will prevail. Drizzle or light rain possible, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and some sunny spells will occur. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
